author: Christopher M. Matthews
title: Tellurian Has Held Talks With Chesapeake Energy on Louisiana Fields
text:
Tellurian Inc. is in talks to buy Chesapeake Energy Corp.â€™s Louisiana drilling fields as it seeks to become a producer as well as exporter of natural gas, according to people familiar with the matter.
Chesapeake, a pioneer of the shale boom, has been selling off some of the vast holdings assembled by its late co-founder Aubrey McClendon as it struggles with low energy prices and a mountain of debt it took on to lock up drilling rights for swaths of land.
